name: PokerPug
description: PokerPug is a Solana-based meme token centered around the theme of a poker-playing pug, designed to support a light-hearted and community-driven digital brand. The project focuses on creating social engagement through competitions, interactive web experiences, and community events. PokerPug does not position itself as a financial product; instead, it serves as a participation token within a growing set of playful activities. The tokenâ€™s purpose is to enable community interaction, support themed experiences on the PokerPug Playground, and provide a recognizable identity for users who enjoy meme culture on Solana. Its ecosystem is built around entertainment, creativity, and community expression rather than technical innovation or financial functionality.
